Detailed Description

Model for real time tasks. This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated.

Definition at line 143 of file rtsched.hpp.

bool isActive ( )

Returns the active flag.

void setActive ( )

Set the active flag of the task. It happens when the task is inserted in the queue.

void setInactive ( )

Unset the active flag. It happens when the task is extracted from the queue.

virtual void setInsertTime ( Tick  t)
inlinevirtual

Set the insertion time. Used to control the order between two tasks with the same priority.
